info.title: GeoDB Cities GraphQL
info.description: Get global city, region, and country data.
info.x-long-description: Get global city, region, and country data. Filter cities by name prefix, country, location, time-zone, and even minimum population (currently over 275,000 cities and counties). Display results in multiple languages. Sort by name, country code, elevation, and population - or any combination of these. Get distances between cities. Get all country regions. Get all cities in a given region. Data is periodically refreshed from GeoNames and WikiData. Backed by cloud-based load-balanced infrastructure for resiliency and performance! If you'd like to host the service internally, contact us for details through the dev portal site. Data licensed under Creative Commons, http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0. For more information check out our website at http://geodb-cities-api.wirefreethought.com
